definition: to screen or filter out/to winnow (agriculture)
to get rid of/to remove/to exclude/to eliminate/to wipe out/to divide/except/not including

sentences.english: Screening separates much of the heavier trash by use of different-sized screens.
sentences.chinese: 許多較重的雜質，經由各種不同的篩子篩除。

sentences.english: My job is excluding all applicants who do not conform to the requirements.
sentences.chinese: 篩除所有不符合要求的應聘者。
